column4: hello, I am trying to install ITK software on Ubuntu 8.04, could anyone give me a hint with compilation problems or should I not even dare to ask about 8.04?
hello, I am trying to install ITK software on Ubuntu 8.04, could anyone give me a hint with compilation problems or should I not even dare to ask about 8.04?
